tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Doctor replaced my old broken filling on front teeth and did a very nice Aesthetic filling just like the original teeth to restore it.

Also, I had visited him previously to treat a Periodontal Gum Abcess for which he prescribed combination Antibiotics.After following his prescription ,my gum Abcess healed quickly and the area became pain free.

I would like to thank him for providing appropriate solutions to such complicated problems.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I had severe toothache when I went for consultation. He followed a detailed methodological approach step by step towards diagnosis, medication and final decision about treatment. We were decided for RCT, but the tooth was not at the stage for doing that. So we went for extraction. Other than this, I did 6 fillings as well simultaneously.

The best thing about doctor Soumya is that, he educates you. At each step he is calm, patient, listening to the problem and explaining everything in detail to make you aware of the 'why'. He is also very rational and doesn't promote things which will not be useful for the patient.

All of this - his expertise, painless extraction, right medications, timely followups along with his friendliness and seamless communication from the reception...the entire experience was smooth.

I have not done implanting on the extracted tooth yet due to my relocation scenario, but there is no reason for others to not do it (if required).

Can vouch for him and his expertise. ***** ** **** ** **** *** *** *** **** ***** *** ** ***** ***** ******* ** ********* *** ** **** *** ******* ******** ********** ****** *** **** ***** **** * ************************************************

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: The experience was really good. The wisdom tooth extraction was truly a painless process. Satisfied with the doctors advises as well the surgery done.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Firstly the hygiene factor and the protection against Covid which is really appreciable. Not only doctor, 100% care is being taken for each patient to protect from Covid and you have to wear protective mask from head to toe. The wait time is little long as after checking each patient, full sanitization is being done, moreover there is a virus filter installed in the chamber which absorbs all the virus, bacteria within the room. This gives a 100% peace of mind that you are fully protected. Moreover the equipments being used are of latest technology and painless injection was used in my mouth which is just superb, everything fully sterilized. I didn't feel any pain for the tooth extraction and my overall experience was really good and I will recommend this clinic as 100% safe in this Covid situation. Nothing more to tell about the doctor as you will understand his depth of knowledge with a little interaction along with the guidance he will provide. 3 years back I did a RCT for one of my tooth from him and till date, have not faced any problem. Nice experience and highly recommend....

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had previously visited another doctor for my RCT which end up in a messy way. I had bleedings and a painful experience there. I had known Dr. Soumya since long. I already had been thru a rct previously. I revisitee him with the messed up rct problem. He took prompt actions, explained the issue, showed me the problem with my root shape. Finally he completed the RCT process. There was no bleeding no pain and zero problems  my previously done rct in the year 2013 is also perfect and i have no problems with the same. I have already recommended some ofbmy friends. For any tooth related problems, he is a one stop solution. I am greatful to him for fixing my tooth so well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been a patient of Dr. Soumya for over 17 years ever since I was in a precarious state dentally thanks to my previous dentists. His keen eye and fantastic hands ensured that my RCT treatments were absolutely wonderfully done. I have never relied on any other dentist ever since and had had all my RCT, crowns, fillings and restorations done by him. As a matter of fact I hold back any treatment in Dubai (where I have been staying for the last 10 years) to come down to Kolkata to get treated by Dr. Soumya. I highly recommend him for not only his Mexican proficiency but also his cherubic nature and transparency of information regarding treatment plans.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
The chamber is awesome compare to other clinics  staffs are well trained and friendly, and the doctor is very kind and practice ethical treatment as I went their with my aunt and after diagnosing her they recommended implant but after the x-rays they said they can do RCT instead which was more money saving treatment compare to implant, and am thankful to the doctor to do the right thing required.
I would give this clinic 5 out of 5 star for practising ethical , friendly and value for money treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The Clinic made me feel unlike the others I have visited, warm welcome by the staffs, as I was getting late the doctor himself came to apologize and explained about the criticality of the previous patient, which made it worth to wait (as its normal in that case but if not properly explained waiting becomes boring and irritating). I am staying outside the country and I am a NRI, I could easily compare them up to the mark of any international standard dental clinic.

Added to that the doctor seems to be not after money at all, the previous doctor said to do 7 root canals, Dr Soumya told me nothing required and he did a filling and some enamel treatment, I am perfectly fine now.

would strongly recommend this doctor doing such an ethical practice, and I he gave me his number saying that I can call him 24/7 post treatment.

rare in India. strongly recommended.

tags: None
review: I was really scared about the condition of my tooth, *** *** ****** *** * ********* *** * *** given me immense confidence...Now, I am perfectly fine and I strongly recommend him for any kind of dental treatment. Before visiting this clinic, I have visited several other dental clinics, but the instruments were either obsolete, or the RCT package is highly expensive with advanced set of instruments.But, surprisingly here I found state-of-the -art infrastructure with moderate cost, which is well within our reach. So, I strongly recommend this clinic for your treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: When procrastination made my bad dental condition even worse, Dr. Soumya Bandhopadhyay came as a savior. He has done  root canal treatment in two of my teeth. The whole procedure was COMPLETELY painless. Doctor's behavior towards his patients is friendly yet very professional. Not only doctor, other staff and assistant ma'am are also really good and best at their own work. Apart from this, post-op service and care are something really worth to mention. So far, very good experience and with this I can assure that for any dental problem one can blindly follow Dr. Soumya Bandhopadhyay. Thank you doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We came with the problem of my mother having pain and inflammation in part of her gums. She was advised with antibiotics and vitamins to reduce the information. After five days we had to visit the doctor to get rid of her bad conditioned teeth, so that we can make artificial teeth for her. The teeth uprooting process was really clean and painless as the doctor used some hydraulic injection that doesn't make you feel anything. My mother could not understand when did the doctor finished his work. ‚ò∫Ô∏è

My mother blessed the doctor as she was actually afraid of the procedural pains. Good to see my old mother out of the fear again.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had fallen during lockdown in our bathroom and therefore three front teeths were broken partially. For which it was difficult to speak and smile properly. Therefore I took appointment from our family dental surgeon Dr. Soumya Bandyopadhyay at smile & care. Subsequently he filled properly those teeths. It is a well filling for which none one realises that it was broken. During examination it is observed that one upper right side teeth was under cavity and subsequently dr. Banerjee did RCT. My father's crowing of two teeths were done by him which were praised at R Ahmed dental college. I am happy to share my experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Best dental treatment I have received. Had multiple cavities . All were treated with filling and rct.. it has been 5 years but all are still in good condition. Moreover  Dr Soumya Bandopadhyay is so good that the filling colour cannot be differentiated from normal teeth.. thank you so much.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My father had to take out all of his teeth due to decay. He was using a false denture for more than 8 years. But he was not happy with the performance of the same. He changed his false teeth 3 times from 3 different doctors! But the result came to be the same. He could not chew properly with his false teeth. All the doctors told him " Apnar maari bose geche , so tight dant hobe na ".... Lastly I got the reference of Dr Soumya Bandyopadhyay from one of my friend. 
He had given me a beautiful solution. He was the first doctor who told my dad that fixed teeth are POSSIBLE with DENTAL IMPLANT. Though the cost of the treatment seemed to be little bit higher compare with the old false teeth we went for that.
Believe it or not Dr Soumya Bandyopadhyay has " Hands of God"....He fixed 8 Dental Implants in my dad's  mouth,it was more than 3 hours operation but my father NEVER FELT ANY PAIN or ANY PROBLEM . Doctor has also fixed his teeth. 
Now my father is VERY VERY VERY HAPPY with this NEW FIXED TEETH, NOW he can EAT MUTTON as he used to be with his original teeth!!!! 
My dad is always blessing Dr Soumya Bandyopadhyay for his FANTASTIC WORK!!! 
Me on behalf of my father is STRONGLY RECOMMENDING DR SOUMYA BANDYOPADHYAY for DENTAL IMPLANT FIXING.
 Thank you Doctor for making my father happy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was suffering from tooth pain. I consulted with Smile &Care super speciality dental clinic Dr Soumya Bandyopadhyay ,he listened my all teeth problems, he took x-ray and advised me for wisdom tooth extraction and rct of right side lower forth moller. I am glad I found Dr. Bandyopadhyay by looking through the reviews in Smile & Care. Detailed explanation:He explained to me the problem and suggested that I go for root canal treatment. He detailed me about the procedure. Excellent painless procedure: I went ahead with the treatment. The procedure was done in 3 sittings and now I am pain free. Even during the procedure. After a week he called me fiber optic post treatment in RCT. He also done for scaling, cavtis filling rct. The Smile & Care super speciality dental clinic whole treatment was done In very reasonable rate has a great ambience, best machine and equipments with new technologies. Also has a good assist staff. Thank you so much and would like to recommend all my friends n new people who are looking for dentist. Last two years my daughter Anusree Palit under treatment in Smile & Care super speciality dental clinic Dr. Sourav Koley (Orthodontist) continue her treatment still today.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I live in the US and heard about the excellent  services of Dr. Bandyopadhyay from my family members. So I and my wife came to India to undergo scaling and cavity filling. We are extremely satisfied.  The clinic has top notch service. The doctor and all the staff are super friendly.  Highly recommended !!

The clinic is also super neat and the staff very cooperative. 100% recommended

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: After RCT and then tooth rebuilding procedure, tooth with cap sheared off. Before implant procedure, it needed surgical extraction. Dr Soumya explained nicely and did extraction procedure well on 23.12.23. ** ** *** ** **** * *********** ** ****

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I am suffering from severe  toothache  for two months at my T8. My house physician Dr. Subhajoy Maitra suggests me to meet Dr. Soumya Bandopadhyay in his clinic at chetla. Dr. Bandopadhyay suggests me to extract the both teeth and makes an appointment with Dr. Avishek Maity in the next available day, i. e. today. I am very much annoyed about the procedure. But astonishingly I feel no pain or problem at all during the extraction process. I am very fortunate to meet such doctors and specially grateful to my house physician Dr Maitra who helped me to meet such good doctors.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr soumya is an excellent doctor, he is very talented and his behaviour is very good. I have done my RCT 12 years back and completed the crowing .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I, a technical professional working at a PSU (power sector), was suffering from extreme tooth ache due to a very deep cavity. I am extremely satisfied to be treated under Dr. Bandyopadhyay. The RCT procedure done on my molar tooth was almost, almost painless; which was my main criteria. I found that he uses 'state of art' and latest equipments and tools in his clinic. Moreover, it seemed to me that the treatment charges are very reasonable, even on the lower side, compared to other similar modern dental clinics. Last but not the least, the doctor is extremely communicative and friendly with his patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had a gap between my upper front teeth. I had consulted few more doctors in Kolkata. Everyone suggested me to do crowns, for which I have to cut down my front two teeth. But Dr Soumya Bandhyopadhay suggested me a totally different treatment plan! Instead of cutting down my healthy teeth he had filled up the gap with some tooth color material!!! Now nobody can understand that there was a gap.
Now I can SMILE freely !!!
Great job Dr Bandyopadhyay.... I'll definitely give him five star rating as an Aesthetic Dentist.
And last but not the least hygiene of the clinic is excellent and behaviour of the other stuffs are very good and humble. A homely atmosphere all around.
Thank you Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Tooth Coloured Fillings,Dental Implant Fixing,Crowns and Bridges Fixing,
review: On very first day I was scared for dental treatments as we all know that it is normally very painful but after the treatment by Dr. Soumya the myth had broken for me. My dental issues were really very critical and he handled it so nicely and moreover truly its painless. His friendly behavior as well as his quick support to the patients whenever it require made him too trustable one which I think very much required now a days. All my family members also for any dental issues rely on Dr. Soumya.  Thank you Sir...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I am Arindam an IT professional, from Kolkata but currently in San Francisco, USA. I had major tooth issue related cavities as my upper jaw was exposed out of my mouth.
I would like to take the opportunity to Thank Dr. Bandhopadhyay  for his untiring effort to provide better oral health to me. I have got huge relief from the irrigation of toothache after his treatment.
Initially I was really afraid of RCT treatment but Dr. Bandhopadhyay  made me comfortable and relaxed during the tenure of the treatment. 

I would like to mention about very special point - currently I am undergoing orthodontic treatment in USA and my treating Doctor appreciated and mentioned about my previous RCT treatment which was done by Dr. Bandhopadhyay in Kolkata. At lest I have RCTs in 6-7 tooth and all are well intact after several repositioning of braces.

Once again a Big Thanks to Dr. Bandhopadhyay and wish him all the best for future.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Had pain after three sittings of root canal procedure and so was not a very good experience 
Rest being hopeful
reply_text:
As per our record you didn't have any pain upto second sitting... But mild post operative pain is very much normal.........This case was a very complicated case because one of your Root Canal was Calcified and I could find it out under Loupe ( a type of Microscope).and you had "Hot tooth situation" (The tooth which is difficult to anesthetize)....... Root Canal Treatment is Amputation of the tooth nerve,  so like any other surgery, mild pain may occur after the treatment. Do warm saline mouth rinse and take some analgesics and come for a check up!    

                                                  But neither you  reported it in the clinic nor me! You and your family is under my treatment for more than 10 yrs. I had done 5 RCT of your Mother and 1 of your.. And a couple of Fillings in last 10 yrs......There was no complain...... So, now,if you have any problem regarding your treatment please report it before online posting.  Repeating again this pain is very much normal.. I have rechecked your X Ray... Everything seems normal in the X Ray... So, don't worry... Come to the clinic for check up. 
I only came to know about your pain through online!!! It is the patient's responsibility to report to his/ her doctor first so that he can guide you properly and can take care of your problems.
